childNodes.textContent: Congrats, you are ready to go!
Your forked repo is set up as an AEM Project and you are ready to start developing.
The content you are looking at is served from Document Authoring.
This is another headline here for more content
Or you can just view the preview
Find some of our favorite staff picks below:
AEM is the fastest way to publish, create, and serve websites
AEM allows you to publish more content in shorter time with smaller teams

attributes.alt: Doors with light in the dark

childNodes.textContent: Preview content at 100% fidelity, get predictable content velocity, and shorten project durations

attributes.alt: A group of people around a Table

childNodes.textContent: Authors on AEM use Microsoft Word, Excel or Google Docs and need no training

attributes.alt: HTML code in a code editor

childNodes.textContent: The low-code way to developer productivity
Say goodbye to complex APIs spanning multiple languages. Anyone with a little bit of HTML, CSS, and JS can build a site on AEM.

attributes.alt: A rocket and a headless suit

childNodes.textContent: Go directly from Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets to the web in mere seconds. Sanitize and collect form data at extreme scale with AEM Forms.

attributes.alt: A dial with a hand on it

childNodes.textContent: Use AEM's serverless architecture to meet any traffic need. Use AEM's PageSpeed Insights Github action to evaluate every Pull-Request for Lighthouse Score.
